attributes.action: Do not close the "Dubs Amendment", allow more lone child refugees sanctuary.
attributes.background:
The government is looking to end the scheme for allowing lone refugees into the Country after only helping one tenth of the children originally proposed.

The Dubs Amendment championed by someone, who escaped Nazi Germany as a child is being sorely neglected by Theresa May and the Tory Government.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
